title: Programming I: Java
description: Introduction to the fundamental concepts of programming and problem solving using the Java programming language.

title: Programming II: Object-Oriented Java
description: A continuation of CS 12300 which focuses on object-oriented programming along with the fundamentals of object-oriented design.

title: Data Structures
description: Data structures describe the way that computer programs organize and store information. Topics include linked lists, arrays, stacks, queues, trees, graphs.

title: Operating Systems
description: An operating system manages all of the hardware and software resources of a computer. Topics include multiprogramming, CPU scheduling, memory management.

title: Algorithms
description: An algorithm is a procedure for solving a problem in a finite number of steps. Topics include sorting, searching, probabilistic, graph, and geometric algorithms.

title: Network Programming
description: Introduction to computer networks and the programming of network applications using the Sockets API.

title: Introduction To Artificial Intelligence
description: Fundamental concepts and techniques of AI. Topics include intelligent agents, search algorithms, machine learning.

title: Machine Learning And Data Mining
description: Introduction of data mining and machine learning. Neural Networks, decision trees, and Deep Learning applications.

title: Introduction To Cybersecurity
description: Foundational concepts, principles, and tools of cybersecurity. Vulnerabilities, threats, data security, and risk management.

title: Applied Database Technologies
description: Database query languages, information management concepts, data modeling, and SQL.

title: Advanced Programming
description: In-depth discussions of data structures, algorithms, memory management, and concurrent programming.

title: Machine Learning Foundations
description: Introduction to the machine learning and deep learning pipeline and concepts.

title: Mobile Application Development
description: Developing mobile applications for multiple platforms (smartphones and tablets).

title: Database Management Analysis And Design
description: Functions and components of database management systems. Relational and object oriented database techniques.

title: Spreadsheet Modeling And Decision Analytics
description: Prepare students to analyze data and solve real-life business problems using Microsoft Excel.

title: Data Preparation And Visualization
description: Data visualization best practices, live and interactive dashboard development, and data storytelling.

title: Practical Computing For Data Analytics
description: Introduction to computing tools (e.g. R, Python) and their uses as data analytics tools.

title: Process Control Instrumentation
description: Reviews process control principles and practices. Analog and digital signal conditioning.

title: Object Oriented System Design
description: Designing Graphic User Interface (GUI) applications using Object Oriented Programming (OOP).

title: Intro To Robotics
description: Introduction to industrial robotics, programming, and automation.

title: Introduction To Business
description: An introduction to the internal operations and external environment of contemporary business.

title: Entrepreneurship And Creative Managerial Thinking
description: Provides students with a solid foundation in terms of the vital role played by entrepreneurs.

title: Marketing Management
description: An integrated analysis of major marketing decisions, including product pricing, advertising, and distribution.

title: Paid Digital Marketing Strategy
description: Provides an opportunity for students to work on a digital marketing campaign for a real-world client.

title: Fundamentals Of Speech Communication
description: A study of communication theories as applied to speech; practical communicative experiences.

title: Technical Report Writing
description: Application of the principles of good writing in industrial reporting.

title: Elementary Statistical Methods
description: Introduction to statistical methods with applications to diverse fields. Data analysis, sampling, probability.

title: Fundamentals Of Imaging Technology
description: Foundation for the development and use of raster and vector images.

title: Principles Of User Experience Design
description: Introduces students to the process of user-centered design of computer systems humans interact with.

title: Foundations Of Web Design And Development
description: Introduction to Web design. HTML, CSS, and web programming languages.

title: Advanced Web Design And Development
description: Server side web development technologies. PHP and MySQL.

title: Introduction To Mobile Programming
description: Introduction to programming applications for mobile devices. Android app development.

title: Introduction To Python With Applications In AI
description: Hands-on introduction to Python programming with a focus on AI applications.

title: Introduction to Digital System Design
description: Introduction to the analysis and design of combinational and sequential digital systems.
